qas.question: What type of fibre is Rajasthan ranked 2nd in production of?
What is the largest city for polyster blouse pieces in Rajasthan?

answers.text: Pali is largest city in cotton and polyster in blouse pieces

qas.question: From what town did the marble in the Taj Mahal come?
What type of deposits are found at Sambhar?
What kind of mines are found in Khetri and Jhunjhunu ?
What does Bhiwandi produce more of than Kota?
What prominent companies are located in Pali?
What was mined in Pali for The Taj Mahal?
What type of mines are in Bhilwara?
What is another term for white marble?

context: The main industries are mineral based, agriculture based, and textile based. Rajasthan is the second largest producer of <a0_0>polyester fibre<a0_0/> in India. The Pali and Bhilwara District produces more <b5_0>cloth<b5_0/> than Bhiwandi, Maharashtra and the bhilwara is the largest city in suitings production and export and <a1_0>Pali is largest city in cotton and polyster in blouse pieces<a1_0/> and rubia production and export. Several prominent <b6_0>chemical and engineering<b6_0/> companies are located in the city of Kota, in southern Rajasthan. Rajasthan is pre-eminent in quarrying and mining in India. The Taj Mahal was built from the <b7_0>white marble<b7_0/> which was mined from a town called <a2_0>Makrana<a2_0/>. The state is the second largest source of cement in India. It has <a3_0>rich salt deposits<a3_0/> at Sambhar, <a4_0><b8_0>copper mines<b8_0/><a4_0/> at Khetri, Jhunjhunu, and zinc mines at Dariba, Zawar mines and Rampura Aghucha (opencast) near Bhilwara. Dimensional stone mining is also undertaken in Rajasthan. Jodhpur sandstone is mostly used in monuments, important buildings and residential buildings. This stone is termed as <b9_0>"chittar patthar"<b9_0/>. Jodhpur leads in Handicraft and Guar Gum industry. Rajasthan is also a part of the Mumbai-Delhi Industrial corridor is set to benefit economically. The State gets 39% of the DMIC, with major districts of Jaipur, Alwar, Kota and Bhilwara benefiting.
